import searchButton from "../imgs/search-button.svg"; const API ={ key: "844ef5767a95cfb4fbdfaf2fa243b192", base: "https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/" } const Search = () => { const [search, setSearch] = useState(); const [weather, setWeather] = useState(); const searchProcessed = () => { fetch(`${api.base}weather?q=${search}&units=metric&APPID=${api.key}`) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((result) =>{ setWeather(result); }); }; return ( <>
setSearch(e.target.value)} />

{weather.name}

{weather.main.temp}

{weather.main.humidity}
Humidity
2km/hr
{weather.main.pressure}
); }; export default Search;
